author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
missing break after module was loaded successfully so loop continues
but module isn't "found" and thus reports error even though loaded

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5232

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Shall we add the '[Feature]' tag to run all tests?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw it wouldn't hurt to run [feature] tests, will update

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw looks like for mac Travis-CI installed beta.8, but the scripts tried to start pwsh.  Did we publish beta.9 to homebrew already?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT The PR to update powershell.beta.9 in homebrew is here: https://github.com/caskroom/homebrew-cask/pull/40043

@adityapatwardhan submitted the PR early this morning, but it hasn't been merged yet.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw thanks, I guess we'll just wait for that to merged then I'll restart the macOS job

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT restarted the Travis-CI macOS job. The homebrew PR is merged.

title: import-module incorrectly reporting a loaded module was not found
